titleStmt.title: A decree of the Court of Parliament at Paris, the second day of Ianuarie, 1615 Touching the Soueraigntie of the King in temporall matters, and against the pernicions [sic] doctrine of attempting against the sacred persons of Kings. Translated out of the French coppie, printed at Paris by F. Morell, and P. Mettayer, printers to the King.
Arrest de la Cour de Parlement du 2 janvier 1615, touchant la souverainté du roy. English
titleStmt.author: France. Parlement (Paris)

publicationStmt.publisher: [By W. Jaggard] for Nicholas Bourne, and are to be sold at his shop, at the entrance into the Royall Exchange,

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Arrest de la Cour de Parlement du 2 janvier 1615, touchant la souverainté du roy.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: his shop, at the entrance into the Royall Exchange
